HotelElement.Name: Music City by Nashville Vacations Hotel

Description.Text: These apartments are located right in the heart of Nashville, 1.4 miles from Nissan Stadium and 18 minutes` drive from the Grand Ole Opry. Each apartment features a kitchenette equipped with coffee maker, microwave and fridge. Other facilities include en-suite bathroom, telephone, television and Wi-Fi internet access. A fitness centre is available at this Nashville property as well as a conference room and car parking.
